text: When SSLEngineResult.Status.BUFFER_UNDERFLOW and SSLEngineResult.Status.BUFFER_OVERFLOW states occur during ssl handshake the implementation throws SSLException instead of continuing the procedure described here http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/javax/net/ssl/SSLEngine.html
